-- id == 0

-- length = 4
00 00 00 04

6b 69 63 6b

01 00 00 00 05
-- snare
73 6e 61 72 65
00 00 00 00 | 01 00 00 00 | 00 00 00 00 | 01 00 00 00

02 00 00 00 04
-- clap
63 6c 61 70
00 00 00 00 | 01 00 01 00 | 00 00 00 00 | 00 00 00 00

id = 03, length = 07
03 00 00 00 07
-- hh-open
68 68 2d 6f 70 65 6e
00 00 01 00 | 00 00 01 00 | 01 00 01 00 | 00 00 01 00

id = 04, length = 08

-- hh-close
68 68 2d 63 6c 6f 73 65
01 00 00 00 | 01 00 00 00 | 00 00 00 00 | 01 00 00 01 

id = 5, length = 7
05 00 00 00 07
-- cowbell
63 6f 77 62 65 6c 6c
00 00 00 00 | 00 00 00 00 | 00 00 01 00 | 00 00 00 00
